description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Mrs. Borden Harriman [1914 May 28] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photograph shows Mrs. J. Borden Harriman (Florence Jaffray "Daisy" Harriman) (1870-1967), at the annual garden party to benefit the Army Relief Society, held at Governor's Island, New York City on May 28, 1914. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2011 and New York Times, May 29, 1914) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.16143 Call Number: LC-B2- 3074-5

note._content: Mrs. Harriman's friend is dressed to make a statement:  unstructured trousers under knee-length skirt.
note.author: 11418107@N02
